name: Chungo Kong
description:
Relive the classic "kong" type game like you've never done it before. 

Big Ch*ngus has challenged you to climb his great building. The road to the top will be difficult as you must avoid bricks, debris and even Doug Walker.

This game was made in game jam time (72hrs) but for no actual game jam.

Warning: This game is freakin' sweet lois.
